meaning_str.bing:
adj. 外表的；外边的；远离中心的；外围的
n. 靶子环外的部分；环外命中
网络. 外部的；外面的；外层的

外表的；外边的；远离中心的；外围的
靶子环外的部分；环外命中

外部的；外面的；外表的；外边的；外围的；外侧的；远离中心的；边缘的；表面的；外层的
外部；外围；外层；外圈；靶子环外的部分；次佳得分区域；环外命中

1.en: Adjustment of the combustion flame, the outer edge of the bottom of the pot so that it would not exceed, the best heating effect.
1.cn: 调整火苗的燃烧范围，使其不超过锅底外缘，取得最佳加热效果。

2.en: The resulting gastrula consists of an outer ectoderm, an inner endoderm, and a mesoderm layer positioned between them.
2.cn: 最终原肠胚由一个外肠胚，内肠胚，和一个中肠胚构成。

3.en: The hair shaft and inner root sheath move together as the hair grows toward the surface: the outer root sheath remains fixed in position.
3.cn: 毛干和内根鞘当到达体表时融合在一起：外根鞘仍然保持在原来的位置。

0.en: We'll evacuate the outer blocks to let them in.
0.cn: 我们要撤空外部街区，引他们进来。

1.en: Then, there's Outer Space. And nobody knows where's Heaven.
1.cn: 然后还有外太空，没有人知道天堂在哪。

2.en: In outer space? No, in the world. It's much closer than outer space.
2.cn: 是在太空外吗？不，是在这个世界上，比外太空近多了。

3.en: It's supposed to be from a different planet in outer space! Here we go.
3.cn: 这是从外层空间的另一个星球来的。我们开始吧！

4.en: Beck, leave your suit on, meet Johanssen in airlock 1. We'll open the outer door.
4.cn: 贝克，别脱你的宇航服，跟约翰森在1号气密舱见面，我们将把外面的门打开。

5.en: Take a look at this. About a year ago, we started exploring these outer sections.
5.cn: 你仔细看看，大约一年前，我们开始探查外层的结构。

6.en: The South Pole is the closest we can get to outer space to make our measurements.
6.cn: 南极是我们可以接触外太空以进行我们的测量最近的地方。

7.en: It is. I saw the construction. The outer wall is a shell. There is no fortification.
7.cn: 波罗先生。是的，我亲眼所见，外墙不过是个空壳，没有设防。

8.en: Oh. Did you know, at the United Nations, there's a Department for Outer Space Affairs?
8.cn: 你知道联合国里有一个外太空事务部门吗？

9.en: Much of the world's oceans were purple, too. Imagine that from outer space. A purple Earth.
9.cn: 三十亿年前 世界上所有的海洋也都是紫色的，试想一下从外太空望去那是一个紫色的地球。

10.en: He was so into outer space. And I wanted him to know that the world was bigger than his room.
10.cn: 他特别喜欢太空。以前我想告诉他房间外面的世界更精彩。

11.en: He's evacuating residents from the outer blocks. The civilians will be confused and desperate.
11.cn: 他撤离了外部街区的居民，所有市民都不知所措，绝望透顶。

12.en: The outer colonies would never have flourished had he not bought Tyrell revivified the technology.
12.cn: 他的公司发展的不怎么样直到他收购了泰勒公司这使得复制人技术获得新生。

13.en: You see those two? They'll trade work for transportation to the Outer Rim. There, you can disappear.
13.cn: 看到那两个人了吗？他们会把货物运往外环星域交易，在那，你可以消失。

14.en: Hang on. None of Sheldon's theories have ever been definitively proven. My husband actually went to outer space.
14.cn: 打住，谢尔顿所有的理论都未获得最终证实，而我的老公可是真正上过太空。

15.en: Now outside the way, I'm using MILANI Eyeliner in Espresso, meeting that two lines be outer lower thirds of my eyes.
15.cn: 另外要说的是，我用的是浓咖啡色的米兰妮眼线笔，把眼部外下围的两条线画到一起。

16.en: Everything. In Ford's game, even if I go to the outer edges, you can't kill me. You can't even leave a lasting mark.
16.cn: 千丝万缕，在福特的游戏里，即使我走到了外围，你还是不能杀我，你甚至不能留下一道持久的伤痕。

17.en: You're gonna get a dark or a black mat shade and just apply it to outer third of your eyes for a really intense look.
17.cn: 你要用到一个深色或者黑色眼光眼影，然后涂抹在眼睛外围，以达到另类的效果。

18.en: And watch Star Wars movies with him. And drive my big sister crazy. And dream about being in outer space, just like any ordinary kid.
18.cn: 和他一起看星球大战的电影。把大姐姐烦的要命。我的梦想是去太空冒险，和普通小孩差不多。

19.en: Yeah. My Dad says if I spend as much time helping him clean apartments, as I do daydreaming about outer space, he'd be able to afford a trip to the Taj Mahal.
19.cn: 我爸爸说，如果我帮他清洁公寓的时间和我做太空梦的时间一样多，他就可以去泰姬陵了。
